1.1.6. Declarative Onboarding – Installing RPM file (Optional)¶

{
    "class": "AS3",
    "declaration": {
        "class": "ADC",
        "schemaVersion": "3.7.0",
        "id": "bigiq_app_test",
        "label": "Test",
        "remark": "Generic app",
        "target": {
            "hostname": "ip-10-1-1-7.us-west-2.compute.internal"
        },
        "BigIQ_App_Tenant": {
            "class": "Tenant",
            "BigIQApp": {
                "class": "Application",
                "template": "generic",
                "BigIQVS": {
                    "class": "Service_Generic",
                    "virtualAddresses": [
                        "10.1.20.9"
                    ],
                    "virtualPort":80,
                    "pool": "pool_with_vip"
                },

                "pool_with_vip": {
                    "class": "Pool",
                    "monitors": [
                        "http",
                        {"use": "http_basic"},
                        {"use": "http_index"},
                        {"use": "http_default"}
                    ],
                    "members": [{
                    "servicePort": 80,
                    "serverAddresses": [
                        "10.1.10.5"
                    ]
                    }]
                },

                "http_basic": {
                    "class": "Monitor",
                    "monitorType": "http",
                    "interval":4,
                    "timeout": 13,
                    "send": "GET /basic.html\r\n"
                },

                "http_index": {
                    "class": "Monitor",
                    "monitorType": "http",
                    "interval":5,
                    "timeout": 16,
                    "send": "GET /index.html\r\n"
                },

                "http_default": {
                    "class": "Monitor",
                    "monitorType": "http",
                    "interval":8,
                    "timeout": 25,
                    "send": "GET /index.html\r\n"
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
